channel.title: Crytography on SWHITEH4T

item.title: Introduction to testing cryptographic modules with AES encryption
item.description: Disclaimer: I am not a FIPS evaluator, obviously this will not give you any FIPS certification nor the assurance that comes from that. If you really want to be sure that your system comply with this standard go and pay for it. This is just based on my experience In this post, I will make an overview on the different tests and criteria that I personally use to validate on cryptographic algorithms.
